## Project Details
- **Framework**: Next.js 14+ with App Router
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom dark theme
- **Animations**: Framer Motion
- **Icons**: Lucide React
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Theme**: Dark mode (#000102 background, Electric Lime & Cyan gradients)
- **Design Inspiration**: Factory.ai aesthetic

## Quick Start
Run `npm run dev` to start the development server at http://localhost:3000

## Components
- **Navigation**: Sticky glassmorphism header with mobile menu
- **Hero**: Headline with glowing URL input and animated gradients
- **Features**: Bento box grid with 4 main features and 4 additional badges
- **SocialProof**: Auto-scrolling logo strip
- **Footer**: Four-column layout with system status indicator
